page.title: 11DUNDEE - DEVELOPMENTS 1985
page.content: Access to the technology park was convenient, and the nearby airport provides a direct link to London and Europe. The environment and views were attractive. The S.D.A. restricted the companies to non-polluting - e.g. electronics or pharmaceutical. The environment had to be safeguarded because of the nearby Ninewells Hospital. The area is to be landscaped with broadleaved trees and shrubs. So far only one company has started to build.W.L.Gore and Associates, a multi-national company doing work for the Ministry of Defence. Phase 1- Co-axial cables. Phase 2- Protective clothing. Phase 3- To be decided. The site of this factory is to cover 25 acres and they hope to employ 600 associates. Work commenced June 1985.
